markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 17"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Ten Lives](/Feats.aspx?ID=2329) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Catfolk" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=211" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 19 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[Evade Doom](/Feats.aspx?ID=2322)

</column>

---

When your character would die, you can attempt a DC 17 flat check. On a success, you're instead reduced to 0 HP and a [dying](/Conditions.aspx?ID=11) value 1 less than would normally kill you (typically dying 3). This doesn't change the result for any other creature affected.
name: Ten Lives
